name: shooter game.io
description:
a top down shooter with random maze generation. 

GAME MADE BY: CHAITUHAMSTER

BASIC CONTROLS
W,A,S,D  --- MOVEMENT
LEFT CLICK ---- SHOOT
RIGHT CLICK ----- SHOOT FAST
SPACE ------ RELOAD GAME
ESCAPE ----- QUIT
f11---------FULLSCREEN

look out for furute updates!!!!
